overview: Only the person who is ready to learn everything that our ancestors were able to do can live on a desert island: understand the sea, live by the tides, build a boat, catch fish, find a "common language" with a bear, bake bread… The inhabitants of the remote Cape Alevina in the Sea of Okhotsk are able to do all this. There are only three of them on the island, and suddenly something went wrong.
title: The Last Robinsons of The Sea of Okhotsk. Part 1
